epa_oooob_pneumatic_controllers.description: Checks for zero-emission pneumatic controllers; no gas-driven unless routed to control or low-bleed (<=6 scfh) for exemptions (§60.5390b).
epa_oooob_pneumatic_controllers.automated_check_scope: Partial automated check using Subpart W flags and computed counts. Does not verify routing to controls or actual bleed rates; field audits required. 2025 extensions do not affect core standard.
epa_oooob_pneumatic_controllers.output_if_compliant: No emissions or prohibited devices reported. Verify exemptions (§60.5390b(b)(2)) and bleed rates <=6 scfh if low-bleed used.
epa_oooob_pneumatic_controllers.output_if_noncompliant: Action Required: Replace with zero-emission (electric/air) or route to 95% control (§60.5390b(a)). Monitor per §60.5413b.

epa_oooob_atmospheric_storage_tank.description: Checks for 95% control if PTE >=6 tpy VOC; no direct venting (§60.5395b).
epa_oooob_atmospheric_storage_tank.automated_check_scope: Partial; uses CH4 proxy (<14 tpy ~6 tpy VOC). Pre-process aggregates controls. 2025 interim rule extends some control deadlines to May 2026.
epa_oooob_atmospheric_storage_tank.output_if_compliant: No uncontrolled venting reported; controls (VRU/flares) in place. Verify PTE <6 tpy VOC and CVS seals per §60.5411b.
epa_oooob_atmospheric_storage_tank.output_if_noncompliant: Likely violation: Install CVS + 95% control (§60.5395b(a)(2)). Monitor per §60.5416b.

epa_oooob_well_completion_workover_hydra.description: Requires RECs; route flowback to separator ASAP, 95% control on combustion (§60.5375b).
epa_oooob_well_completion_workover_hydra.automated_check_scope: Partial using Subpart W totals. Pre-process computes vented from non-rec. Field verification for timing/control needed.
epa_oooob_well_completion_workover_hydra.output_if_compliant: All completions used RECs, no venting reported. Verify separator use and 95% reduction (§60.5375b(f)).
epa_oooob_well_completion_workover_hydra.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Implement RECs and route to control (§60.5375b(a)). Venting limited to safety (<24h/yr, §60.5375b(e)).

epa_oooob_liquids_unloading.description: Zero venting or BMP to minimize; 95% control if vented (§60.5376b).
epa_oooob_liquids_unloading.automated_check_scope: Partial; infers venting wells from emissions. BMP plans not in data.
epa_oooob_liquids_unloading.output_if_compliant: No venting reported. Verify BMP or zero-vent methods (§60.5376b(a)-(c)).
epa_oooob_liquids_unloading.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Develop BMP or route to 95% control (§60.5376b(g)). Record per §60.5420b.

epa_oooob_reciprocating_compressor.description: Replace rod packing <=26,000 hrs or route to process; flow <=3 scfm (§60.5385b).
epa_oooob_reciprocating_compressor.automated_check_scope: Highly partial; uses emissions proxy (no hours/flow in data). 2025 extensions for monitoring.
epa_oooob_reciprocating_compressor.output_if_compliant: No emissions reported. Verify flow rates and replacement schedules (§60.5385b(d)).
epa_oooob_reciprocating_compressor.output_if_noncompliant: Action Required: Replace packing or route emissions to process (§60.5385b(a)). Option for fixed 26,000 hr replacement.

epa_oooob_associated_gas.description: No routine venting/flaring; route to sales/use or 95% control (§60.5377b).
epa_oooob_associated_gas.automated_check_scope: Partial; checks emissions ==0. On-site records for emergencies needed.
epa_oooob_associated_gas.output_if_compliant: No emissions reported. Confirm routing and limited flaring (<24h/incident, §60.5377b(d)).
epa_oooob_associated_gas.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Route gas to sales/reinjection or control (§60.5377b(a)). Prohibit routine flaring.

epa_oooob_flare_stacks.description: >=95% destruction efficiency; continuous pilot/monitoring; no visible emissions (§60.5412b).
epa_oooob_flare_stacks.automated_check_scope: Partial; checks avg efficiency and monitors. 2025 interim extends monitoring deadlines to 2026 for some. No visible emissions tests in data.
epa_oooob_flare_stacks.output_if_compliant: Efficiency meets threshold; monitors present. Verify pilot flame and no visible emissions per Method 22 (§60.5413b).
epa_oooob_flare_stacks.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Ensure 95% efficiency, install continuous monitoring (§60.5417b). Limit routine flaring.

epa_oooob_centrifugal_compressors.description: Wet seals: 95% control; dry seals: LDAR/monitoring; flow <=3 scfm (§60.5411b).
epa_oooob_centrifugal_compressors.automated_check_scope: Partial; uses emissions/presence proxy. Seal type and flow not in data; 2025 extensions for controls.
epa_oooob_centrifugal_compressors.output_if_compliant: No emissions or presence reported. If present, verify 95% control or LDAR (§60.5410b).
epa_oooob_centrifugal_compressors.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Reduce emissions by 95% for wet seals or monitor dry seals (§60.5411b).

epa_oooob_leaks_fugitives.description: LDAR program with OGI surveys (quarterly for stations); repair leaks >=500 ppm within 30 days (§60.5397b).
epa_oooob_leaks_fugitives.automated_check_scope: Highly partial; checks total emissions ==0 as proxy. Cannot verify LDAR surveys/repairs; 2025 interim extends some LDAR deadlines to 2027.
epa_oooob_leaks_fugitives.output_if_compliant: Zero leak emissions reported. Verify LDAR program, surveys, and repairs per §60.5397b.
epa_oooob_leaks_fugitives.output_if_noncompliant: Action required: Implement OGI LDAR (frequencies per site type) and repair leaks (§60.5397b(f)). Report per §60.5420b.
